"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>d6c41fd0-35bd-4886-b5f7-8103b5647606#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Honfoglaló magyar lovasíjász 896</string>
            <string language="en">Conquering Hungarian mounted bowman (896)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erobern des ungarischen eingehangenen 
Bogenschützen (896)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Conquête de l'archer monté hongrois (896)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Conquistando o bowman montado hungarian (896)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Conquista del bowman montato ungherese (896)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τα κατακτώντας ουγγρικά επικόλλησαν bowman (896)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Conquista del bowman montado húngaro (896)</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Íját feszítő magyar előkelő harcos szürke lovon, vágtában</string>
            <string language="en">A Hungarian bending his bow on a noble combative grey horse, at a gallop</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Magyar vezér palmetta arab írók,  </string>
            <string language="en">Hungarian chieftan palmette Arabian writers</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Ungar, der seinen Bogen auf einem 
vortrefflichen combative grauen Pferd, an einem Galopp verbiegt</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un Hongrois dépliant son arc sur un cheval gris 
combatif noble, à un galop</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um hungarian que dobra sua curva em um cavalo 
cinzento combative nobre, em um gallop</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un ungherese che piega il suo arco su un cavallo 
grigio combative nobile, ad un gallop</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένας Ούγγρος που κάμπτει το τόξο του σε ένα ευγενές 
μαχητικό γκρίζο άλογο, σε έναν καλπασμό</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un húngaro que dobla el suyo arqueamiento en un 
caballo gris combative noble, en un galope</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ungarische chieftan palmette Araberverfasser</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Auteurs chieftan hongrois d'Arabe de palmette</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Escritores chieftan hungarian do arabian do palmette</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Produttori chieftan ungheresi dell'Arabo di palmette</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ουγγρικοί chieftan αραβικοί συγγραφείς palmette</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Programas de escritura chieftan húngaros del árabe 
del palmette</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>

        <metaMetadata>

            </role>

        org:Sulinet

      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
